metadata.creator: Byte Enchanters
metadata.description: Chicago 1920. You need to be pitiless, cold, cunning, smart, yet elegant and loyal. Build a crime empire, gain political and economic control over the whole city, crush other gangs via cleverly timed attacks and legal bills. In real time, over the Internet.
metadata.subject: Windows games; Vintage computer games; Strategy games
metadata.title: Legal Crime
